destination_namespaces.description: The namespaces (comma separated) to which data will be sent.

destination_topics.description: The topics (comma separated) to which data will be sent.

requires_session.description: Flag indicating whether a session is required.

source_subscription.description: The subscription from which data will be retrieved.
